docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. ASHMORE, of South Carolina, yesterday called the attention of the house of Representatives to a, series of silly and indecent impertinences aimed at Hon. Mr. PRYOR of Virginia, in what purported to be a report of the proceedings of the House on the previous day, is the New-York Herald.

headline.main: The Street Inspector on City Cars.

docs.lead_paragraph: We are glad to see that Mr. DELAVAN, the City Inspector, has devoted a paragraph in his report to the car nuisance on the City Railroads. He calls the attention of the Common Council to the cramming system as now pursued on all of them, as most injurious to the public health. He alleges that the manner in ...

docs.snippet: The celebrated lawsuit, known as the "Lemmon Slave Case," has at last been reached upon the calendar of the Court of Appeals, at Albany. Yesterday, upon the opening of the Court, Mr. CHARLES O'CONOR, who is nominally retained by the plaintiff, but...

headline.main: THE SLAVERY QUESTION.; Argument of the Lemmon Case before the Court of Appeals. Points Argued by Mr. Charles O'Conor for the ...

docs.lead_paragraph: The celebrated lawsuit, known as the "Lemmon Slave Case," has at last been reached upon the calendar of the Court of Appeals, at Albany. Yesterday, upon the opening of the Court, Mr. CHARLES O'CONOR, who is nominally retained by the plaintiff, but actually by the State of Virginia, proceeded to present the case of his clients. It may be proper briefly to recapitulate the facts of the cause of action.

headline.main: AFFAIRS IN ENGLAND.; A Papist Baronet--Change in the Politics of the London Chronicle--Wilson, the New India Rubber Financier--A Rascal Attorney--Miscellaneous.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. BOWYER, that British Senator, and future baronet, was decorated lately with the Close of Saint Gregory, and wore it, as it is said, over a British uniform. What uniform? Mr. BOWYER is a lay or honorary non-combatant member of the Victoria Rifles.

docs.snippet: The U.S. Flag-ship Roanoke, getting short of water, and the Railroad Company not being able to continue to supply her out of the tanks on shore, left here on the morning of the 3d instant for Porto Bello, for the purpose of filling up her water.

headline.main: SCIENTIFIC NOTES.; Steam Versus Stairs--The Movable Room in the Fifth-avenue Hotel-Value of the Principle for Private Residences, and for all "Elevators."

docs.lead_paragraph: The normal achievements of steam have been in horizontal, and not in vertical planes. Its abnormal demonstrations, through the means of ordinary elevators and boiler explosions, have deviated to a considerable extent from the regularity and direction of its more familiar and desirable developments.
